amendment.description: To provide a a complete substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 619 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 619 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 162.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 619.
Amendment SA 619 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6233-6238) To provide a a complete substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 619 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 162.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 619 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
